subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Maroon, who has 9 points in 14 playoff games with the Ducks this season, contemplated life without hockey in 2010 when the Philadelphia Flyers’ A.H.L. affiliate sent him home.
snippet: Maroon, who has 9 points in 14 playoff games with the Ducks this season, contemplated life without hockey in 2010 when the Philadelphia Flyers’ A.H.L. affiliate sent him home.
